skills.name: Eldritch Shards
skills.description: [SP: 6][CD: 21s] Deploys the weapon: Knocks down enemies in the AOE, deals 200% ATK of Physical DMG, and summons an 8s hail of blades that deals 75.0% ATK of AOE Physical DMG and adds 1 Combo Hit count every 0.2s.

skills.name: Witching Hour
skills.description: Wielder gains 20.0% Total DMG Multiplier. Every 10 hits (including Basic ATKs, Charged ATKs, weapon skills, and Ultimate) on enemies gives the wielder and the cross a 2.5% Physical DMG buff. Max stack: 10.
